translation: The Blessed Lord said, "Behold, O Arjuna, forms of Mine, by the hundreds and thousands, of different sorts, divine, and of various colors and shapes."
commentary: 11.5 See behold? May My? Partha O Partha? Forms forms? Hundreds by hundreds? Then and? Sahasrashah by thousands? Nanavidhani of different sorts? Divine divine? of various colors and shapes? f and.Commentary Divyani Divine supernatural.Satasah? Sahasrasah By the hundreds and thousands -- countless.O Arjuna? I want you to behold the Cosmic Form. All beings and entities are there. The fat and
